replies.body: UWO gonna take it all I'm FEELING IT!
Sponsor me so I can finish university {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Can't wait to watch the games! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Does anybody have any information about the championship play ins? I find collegiate lol interesting to watch, but the information is so sparse so I can only follow the well marketed parts. Like, where is RMU and UBC aren't they supposed to be one of the best teams, having been the top 2 teams 2 and 3 years ago? Did they really fall below 8th place?

Hey Mistbu, you can check out the information on the rest of the season on [Battlefy](https://battlefy.com/2018-college-league-of-legends-season).  The Play-In is specifically [here](https://battlefy.com/2018-college-league-of-legends-season/championship-play-in/5acb9e2d7542120385f8b3be/info?infoTab=details) (neither UBC nor RMU made Play-Ins, either).

why is nobody addressing the issue of HALF MY TEAM disconnecting two games in a row as soon as they start the red buff bot side? We didn't even get loss prevented the second time. I know this isn't the time or the place but reds are silent on this and it's made it unplayable for me and my four friends.
LET"S GO WESTERN!!!!! GO MY BOYS!!!!!
I'm going to tune it on Thursday and PRAY my home state Illinois takes an upset Victory over the number one seed... Maybe? :3
